name: Freeway Redux
description:
This is an add-on to GameMaker Studio tutorial on Youtube

  • PLAYER 1 "W KEY" and "S KEY" to move up and down... "D KEY" to shoot.
  • PLAYER 2 "UP ARROW" and "DOWN ARROW" to move up and down... "LEFT ARROW" to shoot.
  • "R KEY" to Restart, "ESC" to Exit... +/- on numpad to increase/decrease target 

This is the REDUX version with the following added features;

  1. Egg throwing.
  2. Screen shake when getting hit by a car or an egg.
  3. Blood when getting hit by a car.
  4. Cooldown meters for respawns and shoots.
  5. Shadows for all objects.
  6. Better feedback from the HUD
  7. The ability to increase or decrease the target score.
